languages.text: "Элантах, я все же застала тебя в сей обители". {n}Ирлиэт подходит ближе и плавно складывает ладони в незнакомом жесте.{/n} "Этот символ несет в себе много смыслов — смирение, горе, утрату, стыд, сожаление. Надеюсь, ты примешь их все. Потому что мне жаль твой мир, твоих подданных, твой дворец... И то, что сотворили с ними мои собратья".

"Elantach, I finally found you in this dwelling." {n}Yrliet comes closer and smoothly makes an unfamiliar gesture with her hands.{/n} "This symbol has many meanings — humility, grief, loss, shame, regret. I hope you will accept them all. Because I am sorry for what happened to your world, to your subjects, to your palace... and for what my kin did to them."
languages.original_text: "Элантах, я все же застала тебя в сей обители". {n}Ирлиэт подходит ближе и плавно складывает ладони в незнакомом жесте.{/n} "Этот символ несет в себе много смыслов — смирение, горе, утрату, стыд, сожаление. Надеюсь, ты примешь их все. Потому что мне жаль твой мир, твоих подданных, твой дворец... И то, что сотворили с ними мои собратья".

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, I finally found you in this dwelling." {n}Yrliet comes closer and smoothly folds her hands in an unknown gesture.{/n} "This symbol has many meanings — humility, grief, loss, shame, regret. I hope you will accept them all. Because I am sorry for what happened to your world, to your subjects, to your castle... And for what my kinsmen had done to them."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, I finally found you in this dwelling." {n}Yrliet comes closer and smoothly folds her hands in an unknown gesture.{/n} "This symbol has many meanings — humility, grief, loss, shame, regret. I hope you will accept them all. Because I am sorry for what happened to your world, to your subjects, to your castle... And for what my kinsmen had done to them."

I hope you will accept them all. Because I am sorry for what happened to your world, to your subjects, to your palace... and for what my kin did to them."

I hope you will accept them all. Because I am sorry for what happened to your world, to your subjects, to your palace... and for what my kin did to them."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “外界人，我终于找到你了。”{n}伊莉耶特走近你身边，用双手做了一个你从未见过的手势。{/n}“这个手势有很多含义——谦逊、悲伤、羞愧、遗憾，这也是我想向你表达的所有情绪。我为你的世界、你的臣民、你的宫殿所遭遇的一切，以及我的族人的所作所为……感到非常抱歉。”
languages.original_text: "Elantach, I finally found you in this dwelling." {n}Yrliet comes closer and smoothly makes an unfamiliar gesture with her hands.{/n} "This symbol has many meanings — humility, grief, loss, shame, regret. I hope you will accept them all. Because I am sorry for what happened to your world, to your subjects, to your palace... and for what my kin did to them."

traits.locale_text: “外界人，我终于找到你了。”{n}伊莉耶特走近你身边，用双手做了一个你从未见过的手势。{/n}“这个手势有很多含义——谦逊、悲伤、羞愧、遗憾，这也是我想向你表达的所有情绪。我为你的世界、你的臣民、你的宫殿所遭遇的一切，以及我的族人的所作所为……感到非常抱歉。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Elantach, por fin te encuentro en esta morada». {n}Yrliet se te acerca y hace un grácil gesto con las manos que no te resulta familiar.{/n} «Este símbolo posee muchos significados: humildad, dolor, pérdida, vergüenza, remordimiento. Espero que los aceptes todos. Porque lamento lo que le ocurrió a tu mundo, a tus súbditos, a tu palacio... y lo que mis congéneres les hicieron a todos».
languages.original_text: "Elantach, I finally found you in this dwelling." {n}Yrliet comes closer and smoothly makes an unfamiliar gesture with her hands.{/n} "This symbol has many meanings — humility, grief, loss, shame, regret. I hope you will accept them all. Because I am sorry for what happened to your world, to your subjects, to your palace... and for what my kin did to them."

traits.locale_text: «Elantach, por fin te encuentro en esta morada». {n}Yrliet se te acerca y hace un grácil gesto con las manos que no te resulta familiar.{/n} «Este símbolo posee muchos significados: humildad, dolor, pérdida, vergüenza, remordimiento. Espero que los aceptes todos. Porque lamento lo que le ocurrió a tu mundo, a tus súbditos, a tu palacio... y lo que mis congéneres les hicieron a todos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Elantach, je vous trouve enfin. » {n}Yrliet s'approche et vous adresse un mouvement gracieux de la main qui ne vous est pas familier.{/n} « Ce symbole a de nombreuses significations : l'humilité, le deuil, la perte, la honte et le regret. J'espère que vous les accepterez tous. Je suis désolée de ce qui est arrivé à votre monde, à vos sujets, à votre palais... et pour la responsabilité de mes semblables dans ces tragédies. »
languages.original_text: "Elantach, I finally found you in this dwelling." {n}Yrliet comes closer and smoothly makes an unfamiliar gesture with her hands.{/n} "This symbol has many meanings — humility, grief, loss, shame, regret. I hope you will accept them all. Because I am sorry for what happened to your world, to your subjects, to your palace... and for what my kin did to them."

traits.locale_text: « Elantach, je vous trouve enfin. » {n}Yrliet s'approche et vous adresse un mouvement gracieux de la main qui ne vous est pas familier.{/n} « Ce symbole a de nombreuses significations : l'humilité, le deuil, la perte, la honte et le regret. J'espère que vous les accepterez tous. Je suis désolée de ce qui est arrivé à votre monde, à vos sujets, à votre palais... et pour la responsabilité de mes semblables dans ces tragédies. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Elantach, endlich finde ich Euch in dieser Behausung." {n}Yrliet kommt näher und macht elegant mit ihren Händen eine dir unbekannte Geste.{/n} "Dieses Symbol hat viele Bedeutungen – Demut, Kummer, Verlust, Scham, Reue. Ich hoffe, Ihr akzeptiert sie alle. Denn ich bedauere, was mit Eurer Welt geschehen ist, Euren Untertanen, Eurem Palast ... und was die Meinen damit gemacht haben."
languages.original_text: "Elantach, I finally found you in this dwelling." {n}Yrliet comes closer and smoothly makes an unfamiliar gesture with her hands.{/n} "This symbol has many meanings — humility, grief, loss, shame, regret. I hope you will accept them all. Because I am sorry for what happened to your world, to your subjects, to your palace... and for what my kin did to them."

traits.locale_text: "Elantach, endlich finde ich Euch in dieser Behausung." {n}Yrliet kommt näher und macht elegant mit ihren Händen eine dir unbekannte Geste.{/n} "Dieses Symbol hat viele Bedeutungen – Demut, Kummer, Verlust, Scham, Reue. Ich hoffe, Ihr akzeptiert sie alle. Denn ich bedauere, was mit Eurer Welt geschehen ist, Euren Untertanen, Eurem Palast ... und was die Meinen damit gemacht haben."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタ、やっとこの住居でお前を見つけることができた」{n}ユリエットは近づいてくると、両手で見慣れないジェスチャーをする。{/n}「このシンボルには多くの意味がある…謙虚、悲しみ、喪失、恥、後悔。そのすべてを受け入れてほしい。お前の世界に、お前の臣下に、お前の宮殿に起きたこと…そして我の同族がそれらにしたことを…申し訳なく思っているのだ」
languages.original_text: "Elantach, I finally found you in this dwelling." {n}Yrliet comes closer and smoothly makes an unfamiliar gesture with her hands.{/n} "This symbol has many meanings — humility, grief, loss, shame, regret. I hope you will accept them all. Because I am sorry for what happened to your world, to your subjects, to your palace... and for what my kin did to them."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、やっとこの住居でお前を見つけることができた」{n}ユリエットは近づいてくると、両手で見慣れないジェスチャーをする。{/n}「このシンボルには多くの意味がある…謙虚、悲しみ、喪失、恥、後悔。そのすべてを受け入れてほしい。お前の世界に、お前の臣下に、お前の宮殿に起きたこと…そして我の同族がそれらにしたことを…申し訳なく思っているのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Elantach, sonunda seni burada buldum." {n}Yrliet sana yaklaşıp elleriyle anlamını bilmediğin bir işaret yapıyor.{/n} "Bu sembolün birden çok anlamı var: Tevazu, keder, kayıp, utanç, pişmanlık... Umarım tümünü kabul edersin. Çünkü dünyana, kullarına, sarayına olanlar ve soydaşlarımın yaptıkları için çok üzgünüm."
languages.original_text: "Elantach, I finally found you in this dwelling." {n}Yrliet comes closer and smoothly makes an unfamiliar gesture with her hands.{/n} "This symbol has many meanings — humility, grief, loss, shame, regret. I hope you will accept them all. Because I am sorry for what happened to your world, to your subjects, to your palace... and for what my kin did to them."

Umarım tümünü kabul edersin. Çünkü dünyana, kullarına, sarayına olanlar ve soydaşlarımın yaptıkları için çok üzgünüm."
